title: The Big Bang Theory plot hole means we have no idea how Leonard and Sheldon met
text:
When did Sheldon and Leonard actually meet?

(Picture: CBS)

How did Leonard Hofstadter and Sheldon Cooper actually meet? Who knows because a The Big Bang Theory fan has worked out there’s absolutely no way the tale presented to us in the show is possible and we need time to process.

Way back in season three, Sheldon recalled meeting his new roommate when Leonard knocked on his door in 2003 and correctly answered the age-old debate: Who is better – Picard or Kirk?

Leonard nailed it – Picard over Kirk every day of the week (but original series over Next Generation, obviously) – and, thus, passed Sheldon’s examination, moved into their unconventional bachelor pad and the rest is history.

Only, Sheldon mentioned in a later episode, The 21 Second Excitation, that he and Leonard queued for 14 hours to get into the Nemesis premiere, which is weird because Nemesis came out in 2002…

A fan highlighted the blunder on Reddit, and was immediately met with: ‘Are you Sheldon?’

Seriously though, are you?

The Big Bang Theory ended way back in May, but Kaley Cuoco admitted she only got around to sending her castmates a farewell gift a few weeks ago. But it was worth the wait.

Appearing on The Kelly Clarkson Show, the 33-year-old revealed she’s been secretly compiling an epic album of photos from the 12 years she played Penny, and shared all the behind-the-scenes memories with the likes of Jim Parsons, Johnny Galecki, Mayim Bialik and Kunal Nayyar.

‘I must have taken about 2,000 Polaroids of the cast,’ she told Kelly.

Kaley Cuoco only just got around to sending her goodbye gifts to TBBT cast (Photo by: Adam Christopher/NBCUniversal/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Images)

‘So when we wrapped my sister and I put all the Polaroids onto a hard drive and sent it to the cast and crew.’

The star added: ‘They just got it a few weeks ago, so they started texting me, like, “I got the pictures!”‘

The Big Bang Theory is available to stream on Netflix.
